ValidationRule.description: Requires Reason for Escalation to be documented when the status is Escalated - Offboarded or Escalated - Pending
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS(TEXT( Status__c ), 'Escalated'), RecordTypeId = '0124w000001Yq8h', ISBLANK( Reason_for_Escalation__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please explain why this client setup sheet is being escalated.
